name: Chef John's Garlic and Ginger Bok Choy
author: Chef John
summary: Bok choy is a great vegetable for many reasons; it's cheap, it takes about 3 minutes to cook, it has a beautiful subtle sweet flavor, and of course it's packed with nutritional goodness.
ingredients: 6 drops toasted sesame oil, or more to taste
directions: Trim bottom from boy choy heads
Gather large leaves and cut into halves
Heat vegetable oil over high heat
Saute bok choy stalks and bell pepper in hot oil until just beginning to soften, about 1 minute
Stir garlic, ginger, and red pepper flakes into the bok choy mixture; saute until garlic and ginger are fragrant, about 1 minute more
Stir bok choy leaves, soy sauce, and sesame oil into the bok choy mixture; saute just until the leaves turn a bright green and beginning to soften, about 1 minute more
